quotes.quote: I'm tough when I have to be, tender when I should be. When you find a really tough guy, he's not a predator. He doesn't have to prove himself. Guys who have to pretend to be tough, they ain't. I'm tough.
The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.
I detest bullies for their cowardice, and despise them for their cruelty. I never knew a tough man who preyed on the weak. Tough men hate bullies almost as much as bullies hate tough men.

A man who is strong and tough never needs to show it in his dress or the way he cuts his hair. Toughness is a quality of the mind, like bravery or honesty or ambition; it has nothing whatever to do with muscles.
Toughness is a good thing, yet it is considered good only in men. When a woman is tough, men can't stand it. I like being tough and smart.
Every tough man has a tough past and an even tougher future.
It's easy to be a tough guy when no one's going to come knocking on your door.

My father was a very tough guy with me and my brothers. He wanted to teach us a lot of discipline and life philosophy. As I became more interested in martial arts, he started teaching a lot of fighting philosophy and karate philosophy. While he was a tough father, he also knew when to be sweet and show a softer side.
A tough guy, to me, stands for something, and he's not afraid to get a beating.
When you're playing a tough guy, all the other guys want to be tough right back at you and it amps them up.
I'm a tough guy, but I'm a good guy. I'm durable because when you play football they want you being tough, not just because you sprain your ankle crying 'Mama, mama!"
I'm not trying to say I'm a big tough guy... I'm a typical American-waist deep in this violent culture.
My mom used to say that I became a fighter and a scrapper and a tough guy to protect who I am at my core.
By the time a man is 35 he knows that the images of the right man, the tough man, the true man which he received in high school do not work in life.
It's a very hard thing to resist, real goodness, in a tough man.
A tough man, usually ends up in prison, but a strong-minded man, will own the prison.
I play tough guys in movies and behaved like one in front of the press because I thought that was what a man did.
I'm a pretty tough guy, you know. I'm a pretty hard man. I've got a lot of compassion, but I don't waste time with people.
A weak man's always in a hurry to punish somebody, so he can show how tough he is.
If you think tough men are dangerous, wait until you see what weak men are capable of.
Behind every tough man, is a soft boy, who has vowed to be strong and unbreakable, against all odds.
A tough man always enjoys his thug life.
For the choke, there are no 'Tough guys'. With an arm lock he can be tough and resist the pain. With the choke he just passes out, goes to sleep.
I'm not a tough guy. I'm just delivering the truth and only the truth and if you can't deal with it, too bad.

Without discipline, no matter how good you are, you are nothing! One day, and I might not be around; you're going to meet a tough guy who takes your best shot. He'll keep coming because he's tough. Don't get discouraged. That's when the discipline comes in.
Cowboy boots with a suit? You're a rough, tough businessman. Chaps with a bow tie? You're in the rough, tough man business.
I am a tough guy / With a soft heart / That's why people / Hurt me internally / Not externally
If they didn't call you a tough guy, then what else would they call you? Something worse than that? I'm playing parts, and if they call you that, it's because I played the part right.
